posts.title: Mastercard Foundation summer camp
posts.message: An intensive summer camp organized by the Mastercard Foundation aimed at empowering students with coding, problem-solving, and leadership skills. Participants had hands-on workshops in programming and team projects.

posts.title: Excellence awards
posts.message: The Excellence Awards celebrated outstanding students who excelled in academics, innovation, and community service. Winners were recognized for their dedication and impact on society.

posts.title: Mastercard Foundation sports day
posts.message: A fun-filled sports day event organized by the Mastercard Foundation to promote physical fitness and teamwork among students. Activities included soccer, relay

posts.title: Mastercard Foundation Dinner
posts.message: A formal dinner event hosted by the Mastercard Foundation to honor students and partners. The evening featured speeches, awards, and networking opportunities.

posts.title: Knust end of semester exams
posts.message: The end-of-semester exams at KNUST marked the culmination of academic efforts, testing students' knowledge and understanding of their courses. It was a period of intense study and preparation.

posts.title: Second Graduation
posts.message: A memorable graduation ceremony celebrating the achievements of students who have successfully completed their studies. The event was filled with joy, pride, and a sense of accomplishment.

posts.title: Scholars  award
posts.message: An award ceremony recognizing scholars for their exceptional academic performance and contributions to research. The event highlighted the importance of education and scholarly excellence.
